payload: Create missing ./specs/ directory with 5 specification files: skills.spec.md (skill architecture and context fork patterns), tasklist.spec.md (workflow orchestration specifications), quality.spec.md (quality framework and validation criteria), hub-and-spoke-knowledge.spec.md (hub-and-spoke architecture patterns), progressive-disclosure-knowledge.spec.md (progressive disclosure implementation rules). Specifications must capture architectural patterns, behavioral standards, quality frameworks, and implementation guidelines based on findings from .claude/rules/ and test validation results.
